SEARCH
Package javachess

Class Game

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
javachess.Game
public class Game extends Observable
Class that represents a chess game. It contains the players, the board, and the game logic.

    • setMove

      public boolean setMove(Position from, Position to, boolean castling)
      Set the move for the game.
      Parameters:
      from - The position from which the piece is moved.
      to - The position to which the piece is moved.
      castling - True if the move is a castling move, false otherwise. It is false by default.
      Returns:
      True if the move is valid, false otherwise.
